name: Roller Baller (INeedAwesome1)
description:
This is a mobile game I am currently building with feedback from my family. And now i want your feedback. You can play this on Windows 64 bit and Android. There are no keyboard binds, only mouse. I make this as my first properly game with about 4.5 months experience with Unreal Engine 4. I want your honest review.

WindowsNoEditor.zip is for windows 64 bit. Android_ETC2.zip is for android.

Controlls: Click either side of the window to move.

Objective: Stay alive. Dodge Balls.

The Buttons farthest down don't work, I've not done that yet. Only Summer, How To Play and Campaign works.
